attributes.action: recognise and help children with ADD (attention deficit disorder) and ADHD (attention deficit hyperactivity disorder)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many children in schools with undiagnosed ADD and ADHD who are being treated as if their behavioural problems are down to them and their parents. ADD and ADHD are poorly understood, however these children are being ignored by many schools. Please sign up to help these children get the same chances and opportunities out of school as everyone else. Help the parents of these children and raise awareness of this condition, and more research into the causes and treatment.
